mapper.select: SELECT , rm.menu_id AS "menuList.id", ro.org_id AS "orgList.id", o.name as "orgList.name" FROM sys_role a LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.role_id = a.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_org ro ON ro.role_id = a.id LEFT JOIN sys_org o on o.id = ro.org_id WHERE a.id = #{id}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_role( id, name, ename, is_sys, del_flag, role_type, data_scope, create_by, create_at, update_by, update_at ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{ename}, #{isSys}, #{delFlag}, #{roleType}, #{dataScope}, #{createBy.id}, #{createAt}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_role SET name = #{name}, ename = #{ename}, is_sys = #{isSys}, data_scope = #{dataScope}, role_type = #{roleType}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_at = #{updateAt} WHERE id = #{id}
